summary:
Adds a Blackwatch Headdress (cloth) to the game (craftable at tanning rack)
THIS IS A SINGLE (!) USER REQUEST, just sharing it in case someone else wants to use it as well.
Only humanoid male, very short / no hair.
descriptionHtml:
Royal Regiment of Scotland, 3rd battalion
The Blackwatch Headdress

[youtube]PoNv0xr2eAM[/youtube]

Request thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1449700-hey-guys-ill-start-from-the-top/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1449700-hey-guys-ill-start-from-the-top/[/url]

I created this item for a single user fitting his demands, just sharing it...had to create it in a rush so no, i don't have the time to adjust it for other demands as well, especially since there is no huge target audience (maybe the user, that requested it +/- 1 :D )

I'm off for another modding break to earn some cash, no time for my hobby atm so no i can't take further requests right now. Pls respect that and don't spam the comment section or PM inbox, it's already filled to the top and it's impossible for me to answer all messages.

Male humanoid version, short/no hair only if you want to avoid hair clipping. Craftable at tanning rack. Free to use so if you want to adjust/use it for your mod.

Greetings and have a nice time,
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
